title: Little Endian / Big Endian System
body:
I know what Little Endian and Big Endian is and how they work. But what I don't know is if they applied are for the hole system, or they both can be found in a computer.

For example, what exactly I meant is If Little Endian is applied to my system, there will be no Big Endian encoding found in the hole system.

If not (if they both are found in a system), when do I know which one is applied (for example: for a specific program).

Thank you!
